title: Corona
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For the mechanic sometimes referred to as "glow", see [magic contamination](/Magic_contamination "Magic contamination").*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | Causes a halo of glowing light to surround and effectively outline a creature. This glow offsets the dark, musty atmosphere of the dungeon, and makes the affected creature appreciably easier to hit. |

**Corona** (also known as "**glowing**" or "**backlit**") is a [status effect](/Status_effect "Status effect") and monster-only spell which causes the target to glow with an aura of light.

## Contents

- [1 Effect](#Effect)
- [2 Sources](#Sources)
- [3 Monster Spell](#Monster_Spell)
- [4 History](#History)

## Effect

The Corona status prevents you from going [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible"), greatly reduces your [stealth](/Stealth "Stealth"), and makes you easier to hit (attackers gain a [to-hit](/To-hit "To-hit") bonus of `1d8 + 1`). Monsters inflicted by Corona are affected in a similar fashion, though monsters don't have any stealth to reduce.

This status is negated by being in [Dithmenos](/Dithmenos "Dithmenos")' [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form").

## Sources

Other than the Corona spell, the following sources can inflict the Corona status:

- Evoking a [piece from Xom's chessboard](/Piece_from_Xom%27s_chessboard "Piece from Xom's chessboard") has a 10% chance to inflict Corona on monsters.
- [Ru](/Ru "Ru")'s Aura of Power may inflict the Corona status on monsters.
- [Zin](/Zin "Zin")'s Recite may inflict Corona on monsters.
- [Meteorae](/Meteorae "Meteorae") have an innate [glowing mutation](/index.php?title=Glowing_\(mutation\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Glowing (mutation) (page does not exist)").

The following don't inflict the Corona status directly, but causes the same effect:

- [Magic contamination](/Magic_contamination "Magic contamination") above 5000 (yellow or higher) causes glowing, among other unpleasant effects.
- Setting a target ablaze with [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame") also causes them to glow.
- A [halo](/Halo "Halo") will backlight all creatures within it.

When you emit a halo, the accuracy bonus does *not* apply against you - you aren't any easier to hit.

## Monster Spell

The Corona spell must have line of fire to the target to cast, and it must overcome the target's [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") to inflict the status.

The following enemies cast Corona:

- e [![Dowan.png](/images/e/e0/Dowan.png)](/File:Dowan.png) **[Dowan](/Dowan "Dowan")**
- c [![Faun.png](/images/3/3c/Faun.png)](/File:Faun.png) **[Faun](/Faun "Faun")**
- g [![Gnoll bouda.png](/images/d/d3/Gnoll_bouda.png)](/File:Gnoll_bouda.png) **[Gnoll shaman](/Gnoll_shaman "Gnoll shaman")**

## History

| :---------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                             | 1                                                                                                                                             |
| School1                                                           | [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes")                                                                                                                       |
| Source(s)                                                         | - [Book of Maledictions](/Book_of_Maledictions "Book of Maledictions")
- [Book of Debilitation](/Book_of_Debilitation "Book of Debilitation") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                       | 1                                                                                                                                             |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                         | 0                                                                                                                                             |

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Corona was a player-castable level 1 Hexes spell. [Enchanters](/Enchanter "Enchanter") and [Arcane Marksmen](/Arcane_Marksmen "Arcane Marksmen") started with Corona memorized.
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), a target affected by Corona could cancel this effect by going [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible").
- In [0.10](/0.10 "0.10") Corona received a power boost (+50% to spellpower).

Causes a halo of glowing light to surround and effectively outline a creature. This glow offsets the dark, musty atmosphere of the dungeon, and makes the affected creature appreciably easier to hit.

  • Zin's Recite may inflict Corona on monsters.
  • Meteorae have an innate glowing mutation.

The following enemies cast Corona:

  • e Dowan
